question: Which financial institution releases the ‘Consumer confidence Survey’?
explanation:
India’s central bank, the Reserve Bank of India releases the ‘Consumer confidence Survey’. RBI has recently released the results of the July 2020 edition of the survey.
Due to the impact of the Covid-19 pandemic, the survey was conducted online through telephone interviews from over 5000 households in 13 major cities including Delhi, Kolkata, Chennai among others. The current situation index dropped to 53.8 in July, which was at the all-time low since the index was introduced.
